entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12.
